attributes.action: ensure that any change of leader by the governing party is followed by a general election within 12 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political parties should not be allowed to change the leadership of the country without a general election.  If the governing party elects a new leader at any time into its term of office, a general election should be held within 12 weeks of that change.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
